summary.title: German Smart Grid Threat Model
summary.description: Smart grid threat model for German middle and low voltage, aligned with BSI and technical requirements.

0.title: Spoofing
0.description: Unauthorized device impersonates a smart meter.
0.mitigation: Use device authentication as per BSI TR-03109.

1.title: Tampering
1.mitigation: Integrity checks and signed data transfer.

0.title: Man-in-the-Middle
0.description: Interception or modification of communication between SMGW and DSO.

1.title: Denial of Service
1.description: Flooding SMGW or DSO systems with requests.

0.title: Elevation of Privilege
0.description: Exploiting SMGW vulnerabilities to gain admin rights.

1.title: Unauthorized Remote Control
1.description: Exploiting remote management to switch off/on supply.
